title: Spurious messages are garbled/displayed as code.
content: Some messages appear garbled/appear as code only: Some appear correctly at first, then at a subsequent reading, they have become garbled. Some messages suddenly (not on the initial reading, but on subsequent readings) have an erroneous Subject or Sender, and I recognize the (often garbled) content as belonging to another Subject or Sender. The problem is spurious: For instance, most e-mails from a particular Sender will read correctly, but every now and again a message appears garbled. When this happens, the From and Subject field will be empty when I open the message. (See attached images) These errors began when my e-mail provider Telenor (@online.no) started to upgrade their e-mail service a few months ago, and so far, they have not been able to pinpoint the cause or correct the problem. But all messages appear correctly on the server, so I suspect TB is not able to fetch and sort messages correctly. As a possible workaround: Is there a way to re-download a particular message to get a "clean" version of that particular message in TB? (I use TB version 102.11.2, Build ID 20230526152851). Thanks for your help :)
creator: gelgjo

title: Problemas con "Copiar mensajes enviados" no se guardan en la carpeta IMAP
content:
Buenos días y gracias por adelantado por la posible ayuda que me presten.

Tengo dos perfiles exactamente iguales en dos Pcs diferentes para una cuenta IMAP. En uno de ellos funciona todo sin problema, sin embargo en el segundo, cuando envío un mensaje, tras un largo rato, recibo un mensaje diciendo que thunderbird no puede guardar el mensaje, aunque se ha enviado (y, efectivamente envía y se reciben sin problemas), y con las opciones "reintentar, guardar o cancelar". Si "reintento" ocurre lo mismo, si "guardo" tiene que ser en carpetas locales.

Si configuro el guardarlos en una carpeta local lo hace sin problemas.

He probado todo lo que he encontrado por ahí:

  • Crear de nuevo el perfil
  • Purgar carpetas
  • Reparar carpetas
  • Borrar los archivos "msf" para que regenere carpetas
  • Cambiar el "Número máximo de conexiones del servidor a caché" (bajándolas hasta "1")
  • Revisar configuración (aunque como ya he dicho, los perfiles son idénticos ya que lo he copiado desde la máquina que funciona hasta la otra)
  • Crear una nueva carpeta de enviados para ver si los guarda ahí

Revisar antivirus y firewall (aunque esto sería raro fuese el problema ya que en anteriormente ya tenía thunderbird

  • Y más cosas que... ¡tampoco han funcionado!

Agradecería enormemente cualquier ayuda que me pudiesen prestar ya que, en este punto, no se que más hacer!.

Saludos y, de nuevo, muchas gracias de antemano
creator: pizanauta

title: View all headers, but not forward them
content:
I have set Mozilla Thunderbird (version 102.12.0 64bit on Windows 11) to show all headers of an email message (menu: View -> All / Normal).

However, when I forward a message, all headers are included.

I would like to: - continue reading all headers of an email message; - do NOT include all headers when I forward a message. Is there any way to obtain this?

It seems it is not possible, but may be I am wrong.
creator: lordthistle

title: Recupero log attività di una casella pec su thunderbird
content: Gentile community. Ho un problema serio con una pec inviata il 7 aprile 2021 al tribunale di brescia per un procedimento. La mail in questione risulta in posta inviata ma non ho la mail di accettazione del sistema e il tribunale pare non averla ricevuta. Ho chiamato aruba e nella peclog di aruba non risulta la mail ma mi dicevano che bisogna verificare se thunderbird ha un log delle attività eseguite (una specie di scatola nera) in cui risulta se e come mai la mail non è transitata sul server. Ho bisogno di recuperare la prova che avevo eseguito l'invio in buona fede ma (laddove sia stato così) dimostrare che si è trattato di un errore software. Attendo con urgenza una risposta poichè a casua di questo errore c'è stata una sentenza definitiva di condanna in contumacia perchè non risulta il documento inviato. Grazie
creator: daniloassara

title: backup salva le mail?
content: Chiedo scusa se chiedo l'ovvio, ma il backup generale che ho fatto fare ai miei account di posta ha effettuato salvataggio delle mail degli account? Lo chiedo perchè uno dei miei account è stato soppresso dal server. E prima di cancellarlo causa richiesta dal programma del controllo accesso account per impossibilità al collegamento server, vorrei avere una copia per poter fare con calma una selezione di quello che devo salvare in altra sede di mail di servizio o altro. Ho diverse decine di mail da guardare. E vorrei farlo con del tempo utile, dovendo togliere l'account posta al momento. Altrimenti sono intasato di continuo dal messaggio del programma di aggiornamento parametri mail. Grazie per l'attenzione

title: Thunderbird Email Issue
content:
Hello,

I have set up Thunderbird email twice to my business email account - john@edcmeals.com - and after two or so days it stops accepting new emails. I believe I know the reason just not how to fix it. Currently, the bottom of the screen says checking mail server capabilities and it is just stuck there. When I set the email up i received a pop up that my mail certificate could not be identified and I clicked the continue button "Confirm Security Exception" and "permanently store this exception" and successfully set up my email. However after two days it stops working. My guess is it has something to do with this issue and is TB is no longer identifying my mail server. Anyone encounter this and know how to solve it? Thanks

John

title: Thunderbird on Ubuntu forgets attachment save locations
content:
Hi,

This question https://support.mozilla.org/en-US/questions/1308316 describes the problem perfectly.

With a bit of testing based on it, the first save overwrites the messenger.save.dir setting with garbage (like /run/user/1000/doc/348a7e47, this looks to be re-generated for each file). This seems like a bug, not a problem with settings.

And no, I do not want to lock the save directory to a single one. I need my files to go where they belong directly rather than having to then sort them after saving.
creator: giuthas

title: I lost all my mail: TB 102.12.0, using Google Workspace
content:
I am a Google workspace admin, private domain, using gmail. I use Thunderbird 102.12.0 as IMAP client. I have multiple accounts set up in TB, I sort all my mail to individual job folders which are all located on the Gmail server. I use unified view in TB. I didn't realize that (maybe) "all mail" is in the "Archive" folder in TB. I deleted all the mail in the "Archive" folder, hoping to speed up TB. I also deleted "trash". Now all my mail is gone from my subfolders. I can't find it anywhere. I followed the instructions for restoring permanently deleted email, to no avail: https://support.google.com/a/answer/112445 And looked all around: https://support.google.com/a/answer/6052340?sjid=16067111157835201092-NA And I got nothing. :-(

And I guess there is NO phone support any more, and I can't even email or chat with an actual Google employee? Am I just permanently screwed?

TIA

title: TB login on one Gmail account not working
content:
I have four Gmail accounts and three are working on TB on my Windows 10 desktop. On the fourth account (genealogyjoe@gmail.com), when I try to download messages from Gmail I get an error box that says "Authentication failure while connecting to imap.google.com". Meanwhile I am able to access the account using either Firefox or the Gmail app on the same desktop or on my Android phone.

Using the help pages I have:

  • set login authentication to Oauth
  • verified that javascript is enabled
  • verified that there is an Oauth token for the account and it is dated 6/14/2023, about the time that i first noticed the problem
  • removed imap and smtp logins for the account
  • restarted TB

But the problem continues.

Any suggestions?

title: Email to a single .outlook.com addressee is "sent" but does not arrive. Works perfectly when using MS Outlook
content:
Using Thunderbird 102.12.0 (64-bit) on Win10 PC. 3 accounts, all IMAP and Gmail Works perfectly except.... When sending to a specific @outllok.com address: It appears to be sent and is in "sent" folder. However, contact does not receive it. 3 other contacts with @outlook.com addresses all receive emails from me. Have tried: 1) Sending from a different account - same issue 2) Deleting and re adding address - same issue 3) Deleting and re-adding account - same issue 4) Checking filters both ends - nothing blocked 5) Sending via outlook - works, no problem.

I don't want to go back to using MS Outlook. Is there a solution?
